diseqc_port_t Struct Reference

This structure defines the DiSEqC port object. The State member should be set to DISEQC_PORT_STATE_UNINITIALISED prior to a DISEQCInit call.

Data Fields

  • DISEQC_PORT_STATE_T State
  • DISEQC_PORT_SETTINGS_T * psSettings
  • QIO_DEVICE_T sDevice

  • KRN_POOL_T IOBlockPool
  • IMG_UINT32 ui32PostTransactionSilence

  • IMG_UINT8 ui8Received
  • IMG_BOOL bSilence

  • IMG_BOOL bMasterData
